law.catch_line: Restricted issuance and transfer of shares.

text.section: Any issuance, transfer, or pledge of shares, fractional shares, or rights or options to purchase shares in violation of this section shall be void; however, nothing herein contained shall prohibit the transfer of shares of a professional corporation by operation of law or court decree.

law.history: Repealed and reenacted 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 51, sec. 88, effective July 15, 2010; and amended ch. 133, sec. 25, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 137, sec. 88, effective June 26, 2007. -- Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 149, sec. 231, effective July 12, 2006. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 341, sec. 20, effective July 15, 1998. -- Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 288, sec. 6, effective July 15, 1980.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/15/2010). This section was amended by 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 133, and repealed and reenacted by 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 51. Pursuant to Section 184 of Acts ch. 51, it was the intent of the General Assembly that the repeal and reenactment not serve to void the amendment, and these Acts do not appear to be in conflict; therefore, they have been codified together. (7/15/2010). 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 51, sec. 183, provides, "The specific textual provisions of Sections 1 to 178 of this Act which reflect amendments made to those sections by 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 137 shall be deemed effective as of June 26, 2007, and those provisions are hereby made expressly retroactive to that date, with the remainder of the text of those sections being unaffected by the provisions of this section."
